column5: An email was sent to me from a friend with this link and I thought you all would enjoy this tribute.  Make sure your sound is on.  American or Canadian ................. they are all heroes of the greatest kind.   If you haven't seen it before I am sure it will move you.  Heroes  Tom.  Greater love has no man than this, that a man lay down his life for his friends.
Thank you for that. Very nice.
